name: shorts-platform
description: Monorepo for shorts video platform with Django backend and React frontend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.celery: cd backend && celery -A config worker -l info
scripts.celery:beat: cd backend && celery -A config beat -l info
